languages.text: "Шерин, если губернатор и свора надзирателей не в силах управиться с обязанностями, разве им не место среди их подопечных? А среди тех, кто им противостоит, могут найтись достойные организаторы, которые управятся лучше?"

"Shereen, if the governor and a pack of overseers cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"
languages.original_text: "Шерин, если губернатор и свора надзирателей не в силах управиться с обязанностями, разве им не место среди их подопечных? А среди тех, кто им противостоит, могут найтись достойные организаторы, которые управятся лучше?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, If the governor and a rout of wardens cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there be worthy managers among those who oppose them, those who would do better?"

"Shereen, If the governor and a rout of wardens cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there be worthy managers among those who oppose them, those who would do better?"

"Shereen, if the governor and a pack of wardens cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"

"Shereen, if the governor and a pack of overseers cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"

"Shereen, if the governor and a pack of overseers cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"

languages.text: “亲爱的，如果总督和手下的监察员无法履行他们职责，那他们是不是就该被撤职了？在那些反对他们的人当中，莫非就没有比他们做得更好的人吗？”
languages.original_text: "Shereen, if the governor and a pack of overseers cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的，如果总督和手下的监察员无法履行他们职责，那他们是不是就该被撤职了？在那些反对他们的人当中，莫非就没有比他们做得更好的人吗？”

languages.text: «Shereen, si el gobernador y un puñado de supervisores no pueden cumplir con sus obligaciones, ¿no deberían ocupar el lugar de los reclusos? ¿Y no podría haber administradores dignos entre los que se oponen a ellos, capaces de hacerlo mejor?».
languages.original_text: "Shereen, if the governor and a pack of overseers cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"

traits.locale_text: «Shereen, si el gobernador y un puñado de supervisores no pueden cumplir con sus obligaciones, ¿no deberían ocupar el lugar de los reclusos? ¿Y no podría haber administradores dignos entre los que se oponen a ellos, capaces de hacerlo mejor?».

languages.text: 「シェリーン、総督や看守らがその職務を遂行できないんだったら、その地位を離れるべきじゃないのか？それに反対する者の中に、もっとうまくやれる適任な管理者がいるんじゃないか？」
languages.original_text: "Shereen, if the governor and a pack of overseers cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン、総督や看守らがその職務を遂行できないんだったら、その地位を離れるべきじゃないのか？それに反対する者の中に、もっとうまくやれる適任な管理者がいるんじゃないか？」
「シェリーン、総督や看守らがその職務を遂行できないんだったら、その地位を離れるべきじゃないのか？それに反対する者の中に、もっとうまくやれる適任な管理者がいるんじゃないか？」

languages.text: « Shereen, quand un gouverneur et ses contremaîtres sont incapables de s'acquitter de leurs devoirs, ne devraient-ils pas prendre la place de ceux qu'ils gardent ? Et ne peut-on trouver de meilleurs administrateurs parmi ceux qui s'opposent à eux, des administrateurs qui pourraient mieux faire ? »
languages.original_text: "Shereen, if the governor and a pack of overseers cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"

traits.locale_text: « Shereen, quand un gouverneur et ses contremaîtres sont incapables de s'acquitter de leurs devoirs, ne devraient-ils pas prendre la place de ceux qu'ils gardent ? Et ne peut-on trouver de meilleurs administrateurs parmi ceux qui s'opposent à eux, des administrateurs qui pourraient mieux faire ? »

languages.text: "Shereen, wenn der Gouverneur und ein ganzes Rudel von Aufsehern ihren Pflichten nicht nachkommen können, sollten sie dann nicht mit den Gefangenen Platz tauschen? Und könnte es unter denen, die sich ihnen widersetzen, nicht vielleicht bessere Verwalter geben?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, if the governor and a pack of overseers cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, wenn der Gouverneur und ein ganzes Rudel von Aufsehern ihren Pflichten nicht nachkommen können, sollten sie dann nicht mit den Gefangenen Platz tauschen? Und könnte es unter denen, die sich ihnen widersetzen, nicht vielleicht bessere Verwalter geben?"

"Shereen, wenn der Gouverneur und ein ganzes Rudel von Wärtern ihren Pflichten nicht nachkommen können, sollten sie dann nicht mit den Gefangenen Platz tauschen? Und könnte es unter denen, die sich ihnen widersetzen, nicht vielleicht bessere Verwalter geben?"

languages.text: "Şirinim, onca gözetmen ve başlarında bir amirle vazifelerini yerine getiremiyorlarsa bunlardan da muhafız yapmak gerekmez mi? Bunlara karşı gelenlerin, daha liyakatli kimselerin arasından işini layığıyla yapacak idareciler çıkmaz mı?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen, if the governor and a pack of overseers cannot handle their duties, should they not take the place of their wards? And could there not be worthy administrators among those who oppose them, those who could do better?"
